episodes.title: E32 Heaven’s Gate: Marshall Applewhite and Bonnie Nettle’s UFO Cult
episodes.description: This week, Jessica brings us another cult - Heaven’s Gate! Not your normal 1970’s cult. There was abstinence from all things, spiritual ascension, unwavering devotion, lots of camping, and suicide. And what made this cult stand out compared to some others of the time? Aliens and UFOs!  --- Please rate and subscribe on iTunes and anywhere else you listen to podcasts!! ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ Follow Lucid Lab Podcast on social media (Facebook, Instagram, TikTok and YouTube) @lucidlabpodcast Support Lucid Lab on Patreon! Join the Lab Rat Clan - New Tiers Available! - https://www.patreon.com/LucidLabPodcast Email us with any questions or suggestions @ lucidlabpodcast@gmail.com ***LAB REPORTS*** Don’t forget to email in your own stories! We’ll read a select few each month on our special Lab Reports episode! An episode dedicated to our listeners and their crazy experiences! --- Sources: Heaven’s Gate: The 17 Steps. (1976, November). episodes.title: E23 The Family Cult: Australia’s Infamous Anne Hamilton-Byrne and ’Her’ Children
episodes.description: It’s our first cult story! Welcome to The Family! The Family, or The Great White Brotherhood, is a woman-led doomsday cult founded in the 1960s in beautiful Australia. It is the twisted story of Anne Hamilton-Bryne, who gained too much power way too fast and destroyed all the lives of those who followed her. Especially her precious children. She was the Messiah, and her children were to educate what was left of humanity after the apocalypse. She was selfish, vain, and evil. And her Aunties were not the type of Aunties you would want to raise your children. Listen in to hear all the sinister details. There is a reason some consider her to be one of the cruelest people to come from Australia. --- Please rate and subscribe on iTunes and anywhere else you listen to podcasts!!
